welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sunrise, where the warm sunshine and friendly atmosphere greet you. Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and diverse dining options, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters specifically to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on regional carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and is equipped with luxurious amenities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Public Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
